title: Beautiful Salem 2 Bedroom
posting_body: ['For the most up to date information, visit: <URL>', 'RCG SALEM 978-740-0006', '<URL>', '<URL>', 'Rent Directly From RCG and Pay No Fee!', 'Beautiful spacious 2 level, 2 bedroom, 1 bath luxury unit featuring open kitchen / living area w/ high ceilings, maple cabinets, black granite, hardwood floors throughout, central Heat/AC, This unit offers convenient in-unit washer/dryer, hot water and one outdoor parking space included in rent.', 'Pet friendly building (One pet limit.', 'Breed and weight restrictions apply)', " Located in the heart of Salem's Downtown near many great restaurants, bars, shops, Salem's waterfront, and The Peabody Essex Museum.", '5 Minute walk to the commuter train station with only a 30-minute commute to Boston.', ' *Tenant pays gas (heat), electric.', " *First month's rent, last month's rent and 1/2 security deposit required.", ' *1 year lease term.', 'gonec7dte7y5lox']
